channel.title: Would someone be willing to
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]Sorry if I wasnt allowed to post this here[/size][/center]
Im not at all smart when it comes to php and phpmyadmin. Would someone but willing to give me a link (yes I've already tried searching) to "how to create a register/login.php?
I dont know what commands to run in mysql database. Im using smf forums and their users are in the databse as either "members" or "smf_members" (depending upon how the user set up the tables)
If i was able to find the link above, how do I make it when the user either registers on my home page or logs in than its check/registers in "smf_members"?
Thanks for any help guys
